div.t-att-class: 'card mb-2 shadow-lg find_class d-none' if not contract.client_finance_id else 'card find_class mb-2 shadow-lg' if contract.client_finance_id.qid_resident == False else 'card find_class mb-2 shadow-lg d-none'

i.t-att-class: 'fa fa-times icon not-allowed' if contract.state != 'draft' else 'fa fa-times icon remove_passport_file_table_contract'

i.t-att-class: 'fa fa-times icon not-allowed 'if contract.state != 'draft' else 'fa fa-times icon remove_qid_file_table_contract'
